name: Dino Spin (Octartis)
description:
Help poor Dino out. Dino got stuck in a bunch of cogs! Help out by removing some ol' bricks around Dino.

Controls are "A" for moving left and "W" for moving right, use SHIFT for running, not much of moving around since Dino is stuck!

Press "ESCAPE" to go back to main menu.
